title: Security Service
description: This schema defines the Security Service entity, such as Apache Ranger.

securityServiceType.title: Security Service Type
securityServiceType.description: Type of security service - Apache Ranger, etc.

id.description: Unique identifier of this security service instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this security service.

serviceType.description: Type of security service such as Apache Ranger...

description.description: Description of a security service instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this security service. It could be title or label from the source services.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

testConnectionResult.description: Last test connection results for this service

pipelines.description: References to pipelines deployed for this security service to extract metadata, usage, lineage etc..

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this security service.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

dataProducts.description: List of data products this entity is part of.

domain.description: Domain the Security service belongs to.
